headline: These Industrials Lead Dow Jones Stocks Through January; Apple, Microsoft Lag
summary: Honeywell led the Dow industrials with a 16.6% gain in January, its best month since October 2022. Apple. and Microsoft lagged.

headline: Jim Cramer Says Salesforce is “Really Great” But He Accepts the Market’s Judgment
summary: Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared his thoughts on. headline: Exalate Introduces a New Experience for Running Integrations as Business Infrastructure
summary: A clearer way to oversee integrations as they grow in scope, ownership, and impactANTWERP, Belgium, Feb. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Integrations are taking on a more central role in business operations. headline: AI Capex Clouds The Tech Horizon, Even As Meta And Tesla Shine
summary: On Thursday, Nasdaq fell 1.3% as the market digested mixed results from some Mag 7 reports. The primary weight came from Microsoft. AI spending anxiety rippled through the software sector.

headline: What happens to the AI exit market if the FTC cracks down on ‘acquihires’?
summary: The FTC may take action after a number of high-profile incidents of startups being gutted from within.

headline: Salesforce Extends AI Reach With Army Deal And Wildfire Initiative
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) secured a US$5.6b, 10 year contract with the U.S. Army to modernize operations and support AI deployment across military personnel. The company also joined EMBERPOINT, a wildfire response initiative with Lockheed Martin, PG&E, and Wells Fargo focused on AI driven coordination and risk management. Salesforce is widely known for its customer relationship management tools. Deals like the U.S. Army contract and the EMBERPOINT partnership show how its cloud and AI platforms...
